hero_section.title: Machine Learning Models
hero_section.subtitle: Data-Driven Predictions That Scale
hero_section.description: We build custom machine learning models for prediction, recommendation, classification, and automation — trained on your data and deployed for real-world performance.

introduction_section.heading: What is
content: At Devisgon, we don’t just build models, we build production-ready ML pipelines. This means your models don’t live in notebooks; they’re deployed, monitored, and optimized to work with real-world data at scale.
We help businesses across retail, healthcare, logistics, fintech, and SaaS harness the power of ML to solve problems and gain a competitive edge.

key_benefits_section.title: Key Benefits
key_benefits_section.subtitle: Transform your operations with proven results

cards.title: Accurate Predictions
cards.description: Forecast demand, detect anomalies, and recommend actions with precision.

cards.title: Automation at Scale
cards.description: Replace manual analysis with AI-driven decision-making.

cards.title: Custom-Tailored Models
cards.description: Models trained on your specific business data, not generic datasets.

cards.title: End-to-End Deployment
cards.description: From training to production monitoring, we handle the full ML lifecycle.

what_you_get_section.title: What you'll get when you choose with us ML models

list_items.title: 1. Tailored ML Models
list_items.description: Custom-trained ML models (classification, regression, clustering, NLP, etc.)

list_items.title: 2. API Integration
list_items.description: API endpoints for model integration into apps/software.

list_items.title: 4. Scalable Deployment
list_items.description: Scalable deployment on cloud or on-prem infrastructure.

technologies_section.title: We work with modern, proven technologies
technologies_section.subtitle: Industry-leading tools for maximum reliability and performance

process_section.title: Our Process
process_section.subtitle: From concept to launch in 6 weeks

steps.title: Discover
steps.description: Define business goals, identify data sources, and select ML use case.

steps.title: Design
steps.description: Data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model architecture planning.

steps.title: Build
steps.description: Train and validate ML models, test with historical datasets.

steps.title: Launch
steps.description: Deploy production-ready models with monitoring and feedback loops.

content.label: Problem
content.text: A logistics company struggled with unpredictable demand, leading to overstock and supply chain delays.

content.label: Solution
content.text: We built a demand forecasting ML model trained on 5 years of sales and seasonal data.

content.label: Result
content.text: Forecast accuracy improved by 30%, reducing overstock costs by 18% and optimizing supply chain efficiency.

questions.question: How long does it take to build an MVP?
questions.answer: Typically, an MVP can be developed in 4-6 weeks depending on the complexity of the features.

questions.question: Do you provide ongoing support after launch?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer post-launch maintenance and support packages to ensure your application runs smoothly.

questions.question: Can you integrate AI features into my existing SaaS?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We specialize in integrating AI models into existing architectures via API.

questions.question: What tech stack do you use for SaaS?
questions.answer: We primarily use Next.js, React, Node.js, Python, and cloud services like AWS or Vercel.
